getExchangeRate(address,address,uint256,.details: Uses oracle prices to calculate conversion rate

params._position: Address of the position contract for calculation

params._payInLzToken: Boolean indicating whether to pay in LZ token
params.params: BorrowParams struct containing parameters for the cross-chain transfer

returns._0: Native fee required for the cross-chain transfer

getMaxBorrowAmount(address,address).details: Returns the minimum of: user's borrowing capacity based on collateral and LTV, or pool's available liquidity

returns._0: Maximum borrow amount available (limited by collateral and pool liquidity)
Address of the lending pool router

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getCollateralBalance(address,address).notice: Gets the collateral balance of a user in a lending pool

getExchangeRate(address,address,uint256,.notice: Calculates the exchange rate between two tokens

getFee(((uint32,bytes32,uint256,uint256,.notice: Calculates the LayerZero messaging fee for a cross-chain token transfer

getMaxBorrowAmount(address,address).notice: Calculates the maximum amount a user can borrow from a lending pool

getRouter(address).notice: Gets the router address for a lending pool

getTokenValue(address).notice: Gets the current price of a token from the oracle

getTotalLiquidity(address).notice: Gets the total available liquidity in a lending pool
